plugin.name: Function_Executer
plugin.author: Nick Gammon
plugin.purpose: Executes a function inside a plugin
plugin.description:
Type:
~testit
to execute function "testit" in the plugin.

muclient.script:
sub testit world.note "we are in test" end sub
sub onExecute (aliasname, aliasstring, wildcards) ExecuteGlobal wildcards (1) end sub
Sub OnHelp (sName, sLine, wildcards) World.Note World.GetPluginInfo (World.GetPluginID, 3) End Sub
